statements: UPDATE PatientHealthData SET weight = 70.5, height = 175.3, heart_rate = 80 WHERE patient_id = 1234;
UPDATE PatientHealthData SET blood_pressure = '120/80', age = 45, last_checkup_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE patient_id = 5678;
UPDATE PatientHealthData SET weight = 70.5, height = 175.2, blood_pressure = '120/80' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE PatientHealthData SET potential_health_risks = 'High blood pressure, obesity', last_checkup_date = '2022-03-15', age = age + 1 WHERE patient_id = 202;
UPDATE Patients SET age = 30, diagnosis = 'Flu' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE HealthRisks SET risk_level = 'High', timestamp = '2022-04-15 10:30:00' WHERE risk_id = 201;
UPDATE Patients SET age = 35, diagnosis = 'Cancer' WHERE patient_id = 101
UPDATE HealthRisks SET risk_level = 'High', timestamp = '2022-10-31 09:30:00' WHERE patient_id = 102 AND risk_factor = 'Hypertension'
UPDATE patients SET age = 25 WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE health_conditions SET severity = 3, description = 'Moderate severity' WHERE condition_id = 201;
UPDATE patients SET age = 25, blood_type = 'AB' WHERE patient_id = 123;
UPDATE alerts SET alert_message = 'Critical condition detected', alert_timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE patient_id = 456 AND condition_id = 789;
UPDATE patient_data SET age = 30, weight = 70.5 WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE health_conditions SET treatment_plan = 'Medication and Physical Therapy' WHERE condition_id = 201;
UPDATE patient_data SET name='John Doe', age=35, weight=80.5 WHERE patient_id=1;
UPDATE health_conditions SET condition_name='Hypertension', diagnosis_date='2022-01-15', treatment_plan='Manage blood pressure through medication and lifestyle changes' WHERE condition_id=3;
UPDATE patients SET age = 35, gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE vital_signs SET heart_rate = 80, blood_pressure = '120/80', temperature = 98.6 WHERE patient_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';
UPDATE patients SET age = 35, gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = 'f5765c9d-2a7e-4e1e-b3f7-167a67403690';
UPDATE vital_signs SET blood_pressure = '120/80', temperature = 98.6 WHERE patient_id = 'ed6f0595-858c-4aae-8152-0f51e13dad50';
